DataElement.preferredName: Right Lymph Node Visible Gamma Camera Measurement Yes No Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Text term to signify the presence of dye in the right lymph node seen by gamma camera.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Right Lymph Node Visible Gamma Camera Measurement
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Being or located on or directed toward the side of the body to the east when facing north._A bean-shaped organ surrounded by a connective tissue capsule. It is part of the lymphatic system and is found throughout the body. It is composed predominantly of lymphocytes and its main function is immune protection._An instrument used in medicine to produce images of internal organs after the injection of a radioactive drug into the body, where the drug releases gamma rays. It is used especially in medical diagnostic scanning. (Encarta Dictionary and Merriam-Webster Online Dictionary)_Annotation used to indicate the size or magnitude of something that was determined by comparison to a standard._Perceptible especially by the eye; open to easy view.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Being or located on or directed toward the side of the body to the east when facing north.:A bean-shaped organ surrounded by a connective tissue capsule. It is part of the lymphatic system and is found throughout the body. It is composed predominantly of lymphocytes and its main function is immune protection.:Perceptible especially by the eye; open to easy view.

Concepts.definition: Being or located on or directed toward the side of the body to the east when facing north.

A bean-shaped organ surrounded by a connective tissue capsule. It is part of the lymphatic system and is found throughout the body. It is composed predominantly of lymphocytes and its main function is immune protection.
Perceptible especially by the eye; open to easy view.

Property.preferredDefinition: An instrument used in medicine to produce images of internal organs after the injection of a radioactive drug into the body, where the drug releases gamma rays. It is used especially in medical diagnostic scanning. (Encarta Dictionary and Merriam-Webster Online Dictionary):Annotation used to indicate the size or magnitude of something that was determined by comparison to a standard.

Concepts.definition: An instrument used in medicine to produce images of internal organs after the injection of a radioactive drug into the body, where the drug releases gamma rays. It is used especially in medical diagnostic scanning. (Encarta Dictionary and Merriam-Webster Online Dictionary)
Annotation used to indicate the size or magnitude of something that was determined by comparison to a standard.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Events, people, materials and activities uniquely defined by medical imaging.
ConceptualDomain.origin: DICOM:Digital Imaging and Communications in Medicine

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The preferred Value Domain to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.administrativeNotes: 2022.12.28 Alt VM added per ticket request CADSR0001837. aj

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Conceptual domain that includes value meanings to be used for Indicator Value Meanings such as Yes, No, Unknown, No Applicable

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A caDSR representation term that is used to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no

Concepts.definition: A response or indicator that can have a value of either yes or no.
